alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mecklenburg and southwestern Lunenburg Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wylliesburg, or near Redoak, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chase City around 530 PM EDT. Kells Corner around 535 PM EDT. Rehoboth around 540 PM EDT. Lunenburg around 550 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Gary, Fairview, Plantersville, Wilburn, Spanish Grove, Loves Mill, Oral Oaks, North View, Fort Mitchell and Finneywood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central Virginia.
